itunes:title: Shannon Faulkner & Sex Discrimination at The Citadel
title: Shannon Faulkner & Sex Discrimination at The Citadel
description:
Mike tells Sarah how a troll-ish experiment turned a South Carolina teenager into one of the most maligned women of the 1990s. Digressions include Sally Ride, Anne Hathaway and, as usual, "Newsies." Mike struggles with the word "infirmary" throughout.

The pictures of Shannon we discuss in this episode are here.

  • Saving The Males: The Sociological Implications of the Virginia Military Institute and the Citadel (since we recorded this episode we've learned that the author of this piece has been accused of sexual harassment. Apologies for not mentioning it on the show!)
  • Single-Sex Education: New Perspectives and Evidence on a Continuing Controversy
